        <div class="sm-12">
            <h2 class="message-header A-TYP22L-RW-ALL">Beware of Phishing SMS</h2>
            <button class="close-message-button" data-message-id="29c471c83c">
                <span class="icon icon-delete" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                <span class="visuallyhidden"></span>
            </button>
        </div>
        <div class="sm-12 lg-8">
            <div class="message-text A-TYP16R-RW-ALL"><p>HSBC will never ask customers to contact third-party insurance companies via SMS links or phone numbers. All our one-way SMS bears IDs starting with '#' only. Stay vigilant! <a href="/help/cybersecurity-and-fraud/phishing/">Learn more</a>.</p>
</div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_8" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <div>
 <span class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you live in Hong Kong, are aged 18 or above, and hold an integrated account with HSBC, you are eligible to open an investment account with us. Just follow the steps below to start your application:</span>
</div> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li><span class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Log on to HSBC HK Mobile Banking and open the 'Investment' tab.</span></li> 
 <li><span class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Choose 'Check my eligibility' to see if you can open an account.</span></li> 
 <li><span class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Review your details and choose a settlement account to fund your investments.</span></li> 
 <li><span class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Submit a valid proof of address, and a <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/investments/account-opening/letter-of-consent.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">consent form</span><span class="visuallyhidden">consent form  This link will open in a new window</span></a> (only required if you work at a financial institution and are an SFC regulated customer).</span></li> 
 <li><span class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Take our short questionnaire to determine your financial knowledge.</span></li> 
 <li><span class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Review our terms and conditions then submit your application.</span></li> 
</ol>
</div></div>

    <div class="anchor" id="understanding-your-risk-tolerance"></div>


<h5 class="heading A-TYP14B-RW-ALL remove-bottom-space" id="content_main_heading_3">
    Understanding your risk tolerance
</h5>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_9" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Different people have different attitudes towards investment. Some are not willing to take any risks or withstand losses, and therefore would rather forgo potentially higher returns. Some are willing to take some risks but tend to avoid huge volatility. Others are willing to take risks in exchange for returns that outperform the markets.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">At HSBC we use six levels of risk tolerance: Secure, Very Cautious, Cautious, Balanced, Adventurous, and Speculative. All our investment products, except individual stocks, display a risk rating that shows you whether that product matches your risk tolerance.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

</h5>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_10" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li><strong>On the HSBC HK Mobile Banking App:</strong> Select 'Investment', scroll down to 'Products and services' and select 'Risk profile questionnaire' to get started.</li> 
 <li><strong>On HSBC Online Banking: </strong>Scroll to the bottom of the page. On the footer, under 'Investment', click 'Risk profiling questionnaire'.</li> 
</ul>

<h5 class="heading A-TYP14B-RW-ALL remove-bottom-space" id="content_main_heading_5">
    A few things to keep in mind
</h5>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_11" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Your investing time-horizon can be a factor in determining how much risk you can take on. For example, if you're young, you can probably tolerate greater risk than someone who is older and nearing retirement, or if you were investing for the near term.</li> 
 <li>Your total net worth can be a factor too. If you have a larger disposable income, for instance, you may be able to financially withstand greater losses.</li> 
 <li>Your risk rating is a guidance based on what you tell us. It is possible to invest in products above and below your risk rating, but you have to make that decision yourself.</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

<h4 class="heading A-TYP22L-RW-ALL " id="content_main_heading_11">
    What are reference portfolios?
</h4>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_21" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Reference portfolios are indicators you can use to achieve an asset mix that matches your overall risk and return characteristics. You will be assigned one that corresponds with your current <a href="#measure-or-update-your-risk-appetite" target="_self" data-pid="PWS_HK_EN_C96955_10">risk rating</a> to refer to when distributing assets in your portfolio.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We refresh our reference portfolios every quarter, using a combination of several factors including the historical as well as the expected volatility and return of each asset class given the current investment outlook.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

<h5 class="heading A-TYP14B-RW-ALL remove-bottom-space" id="content_main_heading_12">

</h5>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_22" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li><strong>On the HSBC HK Mobile Banking App</strong>: Select 'Investment', then click on 'show me' under either 'Shock your portfolio' (for HSBC Premier Elite) or 'Shock your Unit Trust holdings' (for HSBC Premier).</li> 
 <li><strong>On HSBC Online Banking</strong>: Go to 'My portfolio' under the 'My investments' tab, then select ‘Find out more' under either 'Shock your portfolio' (for HSBC Premier Elite) or 'Shock your Unit Trust holdings'  (for HSBC Premier) on the right-hand side.</li> 
</ul>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_38" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC Premier Elite and HSBC Premier customers have access to our Wealth Portfolio Intelligence Service, powered by BlackRock's Aladdin Wealth technology, where you can stress-test your unit trust holdings or full portfolio against market scenarios, and measure your overall risk exposure.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can compare the impact of these scenarios and your portfolio risk against our <a href="#reference-portfolios" target="_self" data-pid="PWS_HK_EN_C96955_19">reference portfolio</a>, and consider rebalancing your holdings accordingly.<br> </p>

    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li><strong>On the HSBC HK Mobile Banking App:</strong> Select 'Investment', then click on 'show me' under either 'Shock your portfolio' (for HSBC Premier Elite) or 'Shock your Unit Trust holdings' (for HSBC Premier).</li> 
 <li><strong>On HSBC Online Banking:</strong> Go to ‘My portfolio’ under the ‘My investments’ tab, then select ‘Find out more' under either 'Shock your portfolio' (for HSBC Premier Elite) or 'Shock your Unit Trust holdings‘ (for HSBC Premier) on the right-hand side.</li> 
 <li><strong>If you prefer the personal touch:</strong> Contact your dedicated Premier Elite Relationship Director or Premier Relationship Manager through email or directly by phone. Alternatively:</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">    1.<strong>HSBC Premier Elite:</strong> Use 'Chat with RM and team' on our Mobile Banking app to text or video chat with your HSBC Premier Elite Director.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">    2.<strong>HSBC Premier:</strong> Use 'Contact HSBC Premier' under 'Support' on our Mobile Banking app, or 'Contact your Relationship Manager' on our Online Banking at the bottom under 'Contact HSBC'.</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li><strong>If you want to view Singapore investment account on HSBC HK Mobile Banking App:</strong> tap on 'Global Investment View' under Investment>Products and services in your app when Global View is enabled on online banking.</li> 
</ul>

            <ol class="A-TYPS6R-RW-DEV footnotes-list without-bottom-padding"><li><div id="fn-bestbroker" tabindex="-1">Finance Asia awarded HSBC as "HK Best Broker" in 2019.HSBC won top prize for Brokerage Service at the Bloomberg Businessweek - Financial Institution Awards 2020 and 2021 for two consecutive years. </div></li><li><div id="fn-regulatoryfee" tabindex="-1">There are also other regulatory fees collected by the regulators when you trade. Learn more in the <a rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://cdn.hsbc.com.hk/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/investments/stocks/trade25/general-conditions.pdf">HSBC Trade25 conditions</a> and our product factsheets for <a rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://cdn.hsbc.com.hk/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/investments/stocks/top-trader-club/local-securities-product-fact-sheet.pdf">HK stocks</a>, <a rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://cdn.hsbc.com.hk/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/investments/stocks/top-trader-club/us-stocks-product-fact-sheet.pdf">US stocks</a> and <a rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://cdn.hsbc.com.hk/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/investments/stocks/china-a-shares/product-fact-sheet.pdf">China A shares</a>. </div></li><li><div id="fn-investment-ttc-time-deposit" tabindex="-1">To enjoy the 10% p.a. 1-month HKD time deposit rewards, customers need to make at least 1 trade per month. Interest rates are not guaranteed and may be subject to change as per prevailing market conditions. </div></li><li><div id="fn-24x7currencyexchange" tabindex="-1">Major currencies include Australian Dollar, Canadian Dollar, Euro, Japanese Yen, New Zealand Dollar, Pound Sterling, Singapore Dollar, Swiss Franc, Thai Baht, US Dollar, and Renminbi. The real-time currency exchange service is available 24/7 via HSBC Online and Mobile Banking for all-in-one integrated accounts and HKD Passbook Savings account except during system <a rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://www.hsbc.com.hk/legal/maintenance-schedule/#regular-schedule">maintenance hours</a> and special circumstances. </div></li><li><div id="fn-currencycollection" tabindex="-1">Pre-order currency service is available for HSBC Premier Elite and HSBC Premier customers only. </div></li><li><div id="fn-hsbcglobaltransfers" tabindex="-1">HSBC Global Transfers is an instant transfer to self-named or third-party overseas HSBC accounts exclusively available to HSBC Premier Elite, Premier and One customers. Please refer to <a rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://www.personal.ebanking.hsbc.com.hk/1/2/hsbcpremier/transferfee?LANGTAG=en&COUNTRYTAG=HK">"HSBC Global Transfers Supported Countries/regions and Fee Tariff"</a> for the list of supported countries/regions. </div></li><li><div id="fn-fxorderwatch" tabindex="-1">FX Order Watch Trading Services are exclusively provided to HSBC Global Private Banking, HSBC Premier Elite, HSBC Premier and HSBC One customers only. The services are only applicable for integrated accounts, HKD/FCY Statement Savings Accounts and HKD Current Account, HK Dollar Passbook Savings accounts. Customers can trade via FX Order Watch Trading Services from Monday 5 am HKT to Saturday 4 am HKT during summer time (US daylight saving), and Monday 5 am HKT to Saturday 5 am HKT during winter time (non-US daylight saving). </div></li></ol>
